snippet: Saudi officials have not given a detailed explanation for last month’s stampede near Mecca, which is estimated to have killed more than 700 pilgrims, more than half from Iran.
abstract: Iran remains furious over lack of progress in Saudi Arabia's investigation of fatal Hajj pilgrim stampede that killed at least 464 Iranians and over 700 people; tweets by supreme leader Ayatollah Khameini accuse Saudi Arabia and its allies of indifference.
lead_paragraph: Saudi officials have not given a detailed explanation for last month’s stampede near Mecca, which is estimated to have killed more than 700 pilgrims, more than half from Iran.

headline.main: After a Month, Still No Word From Saudi Panel on Hajj Stampede
headline.print_headline: After a Month, Still No Word From Saudi Panel on Stampede
